mapper.select: select test.id as id,test.status as status,test.paper_id as paper_id,test.duration as duration, test.start_time as start_time,test.end_time as end_time,test.name as name , paper.name as paper_name, paper.question_num as question_num , test.create_time as create_time,test.modify_time as modify_time from test inner join paper on test.paper_id=paper.id where test.id = #{testId}
